segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.

segments.pli: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
segments.en: Then the wanderer Vacchagotta went up to the Buddha and exchanged greetings with him.

segments.pli: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side and said to the Buddha:

segments.pli: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
segments.en: “What is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why these various misconceptions arise in the world? That is:

segments.pli: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā, antavā lokoti vā, anantavā lokoti vā, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti?
segments.en: the world is eternal, or not eternal, or finite, or infinite; the soul and the body are the same thing, or they are different things; after death, a Realized One exists, or doesn’t exist, or both exists and doesn’t exist, or neither exists nor doesn’t exist.”

segments.pli: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, aññāṇā, rūpasamudaye aññāṇā, rūpanirodhe aññāṇā, rūpanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇā;
segments.en: “Vaccha, it is because of not knowing form, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
that these various misconceptions arise in the world.

segments.pli: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vāti.
Ayaṃ kho, vaccha, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
segments.en: This is the cause, this is the reason.”

segments.pli: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā … pe …
neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti.

sections.title: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī…

suttaplex.blurb: The wanderer Vacchagotta asks the Buddha why the various speculative views come to be. The Buddha replies that it is because of not knowing form.
